segments.text: Did you hear that they are going to start an exercise class after work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh really ? When is it going to start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next month . I think . Are you going to sign up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ d like to , but I ’ m going to have to look at my schedule .
segments.speaker: S2
